name: barkmark
description: A modular, and progressive Markdown editor. Originally based off of the woofmark editor

scripts.start: browserify -s woofmark -do dist/woofmark.js src/woofmark.js && watchify -s woofmark -dvo dist/woofmark.js src/woofmark.js & stylus -w src/woofmark.styl -o dist
scripts.scripts: jshint . && browserify -s woofmark -do dist/woofmark.js src/woofmark.js && uglifyjs -m -c -o dist/woofmark.min.js dist/woofmark.js
scripts.styles: stylus src/woofmark.styl -o dist && cleancss dist/woofmark.css -o dist/woofmark.min.css
scripts.build: npm run scripts && npm run styles
scripts.deployment: git add dist && npm version ${BUMP:-"patch"} --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m "Autogenerated pre-deployment commit" && bower version ${BUMP:-"patch"} && git reset HEAD~2 && git add . && git commit -am "Release $(cat package.json | jq -r .version)" && git push --tags && npm publish && git push
scripts.sync: git checkout gh-pages ; git merge master ; git push ; git checkout master
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deployment && npm run sync

author: Andrew Hushbeck <andrew@blinkux.com>
